articles.author: Kirsten Korosec, Rebecca Bellan
articles.title: Cruise employees ‘blindsided’ by GM’s plan to end robotaxi program - TechCrunch
articles.description: The news came by Slack message.  Cruise CEO Marc Whitten, who took the top post in June, posted a message Tuesday afternoon in the company’s
articles.content:
The news came by Slack message. 
Cruise CEO Marc Whitten, who took the top post in June, posted a message Tuesday afternoon in the companys announcements channel along with a link to a press release… [+3318 chars]
